remarks: Right identity of a category using arrow notation.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Jan-2017.)
statement:
arwlid.h $e |- H = ( HomA ` C ) $.
arwlid.o $e |- .x. = ( compA ` C ) $.
arwlid.a $e |- .1. = ( IdA ` C ) $.
arwlid.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( X H Y ) ) $.
arwrid $p |- ( ph -> ( F .x. ( .1. ` X ) ) = F ) $.
